channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light out, 29th October
item.description:
Street light out on corner of Selkirk close and Selkirk Gardens on the mini roundabout. The next street light along the road on Selkirk gardens is also out and has also been reported multiple times. Two consecutive street lights out in a row on the same road is leaving the road pitch black and making it unsafe under foot and dangerous when dark. Please investigate and fix as soon as possible as this is now a safety concern.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pittville Circus Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Old Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights out on Langdon road for weeks, 28th October
item.description:
The street lights have not been working on Langdon Road for weeks - it is now getting dark very early and this is dangerous. This has been reported several times and the council has not responded nor made any attempt to address the issue. I will be reporting this issue daily until fixed, as it poses a danger to residents and public walking after dark.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Langdon Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Gutters need cleaning, 28th October
item.description:
The edge of the road on Jersey Avenue need to be cleaned as currently full of composted leaves from last year and other debris. Not allowing the road to drain clearly during bad weather. This has been previously reported however the cleaning was not completed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Jersey Avenue, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
